00007 btMultiBodyConstraint::btMultiBodyConstraint(btMultiBody* bodyA,btMultiBody* bodyB,int linkA, int linkB, int numRows, bool isUnilateral)
00008         :m_bodyA(bodyA),
00009         m_bodyB(bodyB),
00010         m_linkA(linkA),
00011         m_linkB(linkB),
00012         m_numRows(numRows),
00013         m_jacSizeA(0),
00014         m_jacSizeBoth(0),
00015         m_isUnilateral(isUnilateral),
00016         m_numDofsFinalized(-1),
00017         m_maxAppliedImpulse(100)
00018 {
00019 
00020 }
00021 
00022 void btMultiBodyConstraint::updateJacobianSizes()
00023 {
00024     if(m_bodyA)
00025         {
00026                 m_jacSizeA = (6 + m_bodyA->getNumDofs());
00027         }
00028 
00029         if(m_bodyB)
00030         {
00031                 m_jacSizeBoth = m_jacSizeA + 6 + m_bodyB->getNumDofs();
00032         }
00033         else
00034                 m_jacSizeBoth = m_jacSizeA;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void btMultiBodyConstraint::allocateJacobiansMultiDof()
00038 {
00039         updateJacobianSizes();
00040 
00041         m_posOffset = ((1 + m_jacSizeBoth)*m_numRows);
00042         m_data.resize((2 + m_jacSizeBoth) * m_numRows);
00043 }
00044 
00045 btMultiBodyConstraint::~btMultiBodyConstraint()
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 void    btMultiBodyConstraint::applyDeltaVee(btMultiBodyJacobianData& data, btScalar* delta_vee, btScalar impulse, int velocityIndex, int ndof)
00050 {
00051         for (int i = 0; i < ndof; ++i)
00052                 data.m_deltaVelocities[velocityIndex+i] += delta_vee[i] * impulse;
00053 }

00055 btScalar btMultiBodyConstraint::fillMultiBodyConstraint(        btMultiBodySolverConstraint& solverConstraint,
00056                                                         btMultiBodyJacobianData& data,
00057                                                         btScalar* jacOrgA, btScalar* jacOrgB,
00058                                                         const btVector3& constraintNormalAng,
00059                                                         const btVector3& constraintNormalLin,
00060                                                         const btVector3& posAworld, const btVector3& posBworld,
00061                                                         btScalar posError,
00062                                                         const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,
00063                                                         btScalar lowerLimit, btScalar upperLimit,
00064                                                         bool angConstraint,
00065                                                         btScalar relaxation,
00066                                                         bool isFriction, btScalar desiredVelocity, btScalar cfmSlip)
00067 {
00068     solverConstraint.m_multiBodyA = m_bodyA;
00069     solverConstraint.m_multiBodyB = m_bodyB;
00070     solverConstraint.m_linkA = m_linkA;
00071     solverConstraint.m_linkB = m_linkB;
00072     
00073     btMultiBody* multiBodyA = solverConstraint.m_multiBodyA;
00074     btMultiBody* multiBodyB = solverConstraint.m_multiBodyB;
00075     
00076     btSolverBody* bodyA = multiBodyA ? 0 : &data.m_solverBodyPool->at(solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdA);
00077     btSolverBody* bodyB = multiBodyB ? 0 : &data.m_solverBodyPool->at(solverConstraint.m_solverBodyIdB);
00078     
00079     btRigidBody* rb0 = multiBodyA ? 0 : bodyA->m_originalBody;
00080     btRigidBody* rb1 = multiBodyB ? 0 : bodyB->m_originalBody;
00081     
00082     btVector3 rel_pos1, rel_pos2;                               //these two used to be inited to posAworld and posBworld (respectively) but it does not seem necessary
00083     if (bodyA)
00084         rel_pos1 = posAworld - bodyA->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00085     if (bodyB)
00086         rel_pos2 = posBworld - bodyB->getWorldTransform().getOrigin();
00087     
00088     if (multiBodyA)
00089     {
00090         if (solverConstraint.m_linkA<0)
00091         {
00092             rel_pos1 = posAworld - multiBodyA->getBasePos();
00093         } else
00094         {
00095             rel_pos1 = posAworld - multiBodyA->getLink(solverConstraint.m_linkA).m_cachedWorldTransform.getOrigin();
00096         }
00097         
00098         const int ndofA  = multiBodyA->getNumDofs() + 6;
00099         
00100         solverConstraint.m_deltaVelAindex = multiBodyA->getCompanionId();
00101         
00102         if (solverConstraint.m_deltaVelAindex <0)
00103         {
00104             solverConstraint.m_deltaVelAindex = data.m_deltaVelocities.size();
00105             multiBodyA->setCompanionId(solverConstraint.m_deltaVelAindex);
00106             data.m_deltaVelocities.resize(data.m_deltaVelocities.size()+ndofA);
00107         } else
00108         {
00109             btAssert(data.m_deltaVelocities.size() >= solverConstraint.m_deltaVelAindex+ndofA);
00110         }
00111         
00112         //determine jacobian of this 1D constraint in terms of multibodyA's degrees of freedom
00113         //resize..
00114         solverConstraint.m_jacAindex = data.m_jacobians.size();
00115         data.m_jacobians.resize(data.m_jacobians.size()+ndofA);
00116         //copy/determine
00117         if(jacOrgA)
00118         {
00119             for (int i=0;i<ndofA;i++)
00120                 data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacAindex+i] = jacOrgA[i];
00121         }
00122         else
00123         {
00124             btScalar* jac1=&data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacAindex];
00125             //multiBodyA->fillContactJacobianMultiDof(solverConstraint.m_linkA, posAworld, constraintNormalLin, jac1, data.scratch_r, data.scratch_v, data.scratch_m);
00126             multiBodyA->fillConstraintJacobianMultiDof(solverConstraint.m_linkA, posAworld, constraintNormalAng, constraintNormalLin, jac1, data.scratch_r, data.scratch_v, data.scratch_m);
00127         }
00128         
00129         //determine the velocity response of multibodyA to reaction impulses of this constraint (i.e. A[i,i] for i=1,...n_con: multibody's inverse inertia with respect to this 1D constraint)
00130         //resize..
00131         data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse.resize(data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse.size()+ndofA);               //=> each constraint row has the constrained tree dofs allocated in m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse
00132         btAssert(data.m_jacobians.size() == data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse.size());
00133         btScalar* delta = &data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse[solverConstraint.m_jacAindex];
00134         //determine..
00135         multiBodyA->calcAccelerationDeltasMultiDof(&data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacAindex],delta,data.scratch_r, data.scratch_v);
00136         
00137         btVector3 torqueAxis0;
00138         if (angConstraint) {
00139             torqueAxis0 = constraintNormalAng;
00140         }
00141         else {
00142             torqueAxis0 = rel_pos1.cross(constraintNormalLin);
00143             
00144         }
00145         solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal = torqueAxis0;
00146         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1 = constraintNormalLin;
00147     }
00148     else //if(rb0)
00149     {
00150         btVector3 torqueAxis0;
00151         if (angConstraint) {
00152             torqueAxis0 = constraintNormalAng;
00153         }
00154         else {
00155             torqueAxis0 = rel_pos1.cross(constraintNormalLin);
00156         }
00157         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = rb0 ? rb0->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*torqueAxis0*rb0->getAngularFactor() : btVector3(0,0,0);
00158         solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal = torqueAxis0;
00159         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1 = constraintNormalLin;
00160     }
00161     
00162     if (multiBodyB)
00163     {
00164         if (solverConstraint.m_linkB<0)
00165         {
00166             rel_pos2 = posBworld - multiBodyB->getBasePos();
00167         } else
00168         {
00169             rel_pos2 = posBworld - multiBodyB->getLink(solverConstraint.m_linkB).m_cachedWorldTransform.getOrigin();
00170         }
00171         
00172         const int ndofB  = multiBodyB->getNumDofs() + 6;
00173         
00174         solverConstraint.m_deltaVelBindex = multiBodyB->getCompanionId();
00175         if (solverConstraint.m_deltaVelBindex <0)
00176         {
00177             solverConstraint.m_deltaVelBindex = data.m_deltaVelocities.size();
00178             multiBodyB->setCompanionId(solverConstraint.m_deltaVelBindex);
00179             data.m_deltaVelocities.resize(data.m_deltaVelocities.size()+ndofB);
00180         }
00181         
00182         //determine jacobian of this 1D constraint in terms of multibodyB's degrees of freedom
00183         //resize..
00184         solverConstraint.m_jacBindex = data.m_jacobians.size();
00185         data.m_jacobians.resize(data.m_jacobians.size()+ndofB);
00186         //copy/determine..
00187         if(jacOrgB)
00188         {
00189             for (int i=0;i<ndofB;i++)
00190                 data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex+i] = jacOrgB[i];
00191         }
00192         else
00193         {
00194             //multiBodyB->fillContactJacobianMultiDof(solverConstraint.m_linkB, posBworld, -constraintNormalLin, &data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex], data.scratch_r, data.scratch_v, data.scratch_m);
00195             multiBodyB->fillConstraintJacobianMultiDof(solverConstraint.m_linkB, posBworld, -constraintNormalAng, -constraintNormalLin, &data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex], data.scratch_r, data.scratch_v, data.scratch_m);
00196         }
00197         
00198         //determine velocity response of multibodyB to reaction impulses of this constraint (i.e. A[i,i] for i=1,...n_con: multibody's inverse inertia with respect to this 1D constraint)
00199         //resize..
00200         data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse.resize(data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse.size()+ndofB);
00201         btAssert(data.m_jacobians.size() == data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse.size());
00202         btScalar* delta = &data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex];
00203         //determine..
00204         multiBodyB->calcAccelerationDeltasMultiDof(&data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex],delta,data.scratch_r, data.scratch_v);
00205         
00206         btVector3 torqueAxis1;
00207         if (angConstraint) {
00208             torqueAxis1 = constraintNormalAng;
00209         }
00210         else {
00211             torqueAxis1 = rel_pos2.cross(constraintNormalLin);
00212         }
00213         solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal = -torqueAxis1;
00214         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2 = -constraintNormalLin;
00215     }
00216     else //if(rb1)
00217     {
00218         btVector3 torqueAxis1;
00219         if (angConstraint) {
00220             torqueAxis1 = constraintNormalAng;
00221         }
00222         else {
00223             torqueAxis1 = rel_pos2.cross(constraintNormalLin);
00224         }
00225         solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = rb1 ? rb1->getInvInertiaTensorWorld()*-torqueAxis1*rb1->getAngularFactor() : btVector3(0,0,0);
00226         solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal = -torqueAxis1;
00227         solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2 = -constraintNormalLin;
00228     }
00229     {
00230         
00231         btVector3 vec;
00232         btScalar denom0 = 0.f;
00233         btScalar denom1 = 0.f;
00234         btScalar* jacB = 0;
00235         btScalar* jacA = 0;
00236         btScalar* deltaVelA = 0;
00237         btScalar* deltaVelB = 0;
00238         int ndofA  = 0;
00239         //determine the "effective mass" of the constrained multibodyA with respect to this 1D constraint (i.e. 1/A[i,i])
00240         if (multiBodyA)
00241         {
00242             ndofA = multiBodyA->getNumDofs() + 6;
00243             jacA = &data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacAindex];
00244             deltaVelA = &data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse[solverConstraint.m_jacAindex];
00245             for (int i = 0; i < ndofA; ++i)
00246             {
00247                 btScalar j = jacA[i] ;
00248                 btScalar l = deltaVelA[i];
00249                 denom0 += j*l;
00250             }
00251         }
00252         else if(rb0)
00253         {
00254             vec = ( solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA).cross(rel_pos1);
00255             if (angConstraint) {
00256                 denom0 = rb0->getInvMass() + constraintNormalAng.dot(vec);
00257             }
00258             else {
00259                 denom0 = rb0->getInvMass() + constraintNormalLin.dot(vec);
00260             }
00261         }
00262         //
00263         if (multiBodyB)
00264         {
00265             const int ndofB = multiBodyB->getNumDofs() + 6;
00266             jacB = &data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex];
00267             deltaVelB = &data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex];
00268             for (int i = 0; i < ndofB; ++i)
00269             {
00270                 btScalar j = jacB[i] ;
00271                 btScalar l = deltaVelB[i];
00272                 denom1 += j*l;
00273             }
00274             
00275         }
00276         else if(rb1)
00277         {
00278             vec = ( -solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB).cross(rel_pos2);
00279             if (angConstraint) {
00280                 denom1 = rb1->getInvMass() + constraintNormalAng.dot(vec);
00281             }
00282             else {
00283                 denom1 = rb1->getInvMass() + constraintNormalLin.dot(vec);
00284             }
00285         }
00286         
00287         //
00288         btScalar d = denom0+denom1;
00289         if (d>SIMD_EPSILON)
00290         {
00291             solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = relaxation/(d);
00292         }
00293         else
00294         {
00295             //disable the constraint row to handle singularity/redundant constraint
00296             solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv  = 0.f;
00297         }
00298     }
00299     
00300     
00301     //compute rhs and remaining solverConstraint fields
00302     btScalar penetration = isFriction? 0 : posError;
00303     
00304     btScalar rel_vel = 0.f;
00305     int ndofA  = 0;
00306     int ndofB  = 0;
00307     {
00308         btVector3 vel1,vel2;
00309         if (multiBodyA)
00310         {
00311             ndofA = multiBodyA->getNumDofs() + 6;
00312             btScalar* jacA = &data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacAindex];
00313             for (int i = 0; i < ndofA ; ++i)
00314                 rel_vel += multiBodyA->getVelocityVector()[i] * jacA[i];
00315         }
00316         else if(rb0)
00317         {
00318             rel_vel += rb0->getVelocityInLocalPoint(rel_pos1).dot(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1);
00319         }
00320         if (multiBodyB)
00321         {
00322             ndofB = multiBodyB->getNumDofs() + 6;
00323             btScalar* jacB = &data.m_jacobians[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex];
00324             for (int i = 0; i < ndofB ; ++i)
00325                 rel_vel += multiBodyB->getVelocityVector()[i] * jacB[i];
00326             
00327         }
00328         else if(rb1)
00329         {
00330             rel_vel += rb1->getVelocityInLocalPoint(rel_pos2).dot(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2);
00331         }
00332         
00333         solverConstraint.m_friction = 0.f;//cp.m_combinedFriction;
00334     }
00335     
00336     
00338     /*
00339      if (infoGlobal.m_solverMode & SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING)
00340      {
00341      solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = isFriction ? 0 : cp.m_appliedImpulse * infoGlobal.m_warmstartingFactor;
00342      
00343      if (solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse)
00344      {
00345      if (multiBodyA)
00346      {
00347      btScalar impulse = solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse;
00348      btScalar* deltaV = &data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse[solverConstraint.m_jacAindex];
00349      multiBodyA->applyDeltaVee(deltaV,impulse);
00350      applyDeltaVee(data,deltaV,impulse,solverConstraint.m_deltaVelAindex,ndofA);
00351      } else
00352      {
00353      if (rb0)
00354                                         bodyA->internalApplyImpulse(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal1*bodyA->internalGetInvMass()*rb0->getLinearFactor(),solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA,solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse);
00355      }
00356      if (multiBodyB)
00357      {
00358      btScalar impulse = solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse;
00359      btScalar* deltaV = &data.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse[solverConstraint.m_jacBindex];

00361      applyDeltaVee(data,deltaV,impulse,solverConstraint.m_deltaVelBindex,ndofB);
00362      } else
00363      {
00364      if (rb1)
00365                                         bodyB->internalApplyImpulse(-solverConstraint.m_contactNormal2*bodyB->internalGetInvMass()*rb1->getLinearFactor(),-solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB,-(btScalar)solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse);
00366      }
00367      }
00368      } else
00369      */
00370     
00371     solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00372     solverConstraint.m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;
00373     
00374     {
00375         
00376         btScalar positionalError = 0.f;
00377         btScalar        velocityError = desiredVelocity - rel_vel;// * damping;
00378         
00379         
00380         btScalar erp = infoGlobal.m_erp2;
00381                 
00382                 //split impulse is not implemented yet for btMultiBody*
00383                 //if (!infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse || (penetration > infoGlobal.m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold))
00384         {
00385             erp = infoGlobal.m_erp;
00386         }
00387         
00388         positionalError = -penetration * erp/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
00389         
00390         btScalar  penetrationImpulse = positionalError*solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00391         btScalar velocityImpulse = velocityError *solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00392         
00393                 //split impulse is not implemented yet for btMultiBody*
00394 
00395       //  if (!infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse || (penetration > infoGlobal.m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold))

00399             solverConstraint.m_rhsPenetration = 0.f;
00400             
00401         } 
00402                 /*else
00403         {
00404             //split position and velocity into rhs and m_rhsPenetration
00405             solverConstraint.m_rhs = velocityImpulse;
00406             solverConstraint.m_rhsPenetration = penetrationImpulse;
00407         }
00408         */
00409 
00410         solverConstraint.m_cfm = 0.f;
00411         solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = lowerLimit;
00412         solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = upperLimit;
00413     }
00414     
00415     return rel_vel;
